string-array.name: builtin_methods
string-array.item: byte methodWithInt8(byte)
long methodWithUInt8(long)
short methodWithInt16(short)
long methodWithUInt16(long)
int methodWithInt32(int)
long methodWithUInt32(long)
long methodWithInt64(long)
long methodWithUInt64(long)
boolean methodWithBoolean(boolean)
float methodWithFloat(float)
double methodWithDouble(double)
byte[] methodWithByteBuffer(byte[])
double methodWithFloatAndInteger(float, byte)

string-array.name: builtin_methods_description
string-array.item: Returns the input 8 bit int increased by 1
Returns the input unsigned 8 bit int increased by 1
Returns the input 16 bit int increased by 1
Returns the input unsigned 16 bit int increased by 1
Returns the input 32 bit int increased by 1
Returns the input unsigned 32 bit int increased by 1
Returns the input 64 bit int increased by 1
Returns the input unsigned 64 bit int increased by 1
Returns the inverted value of the input boolean
Returns a float, half of the input value
Returns a double, two times the value of the input
Returns the given string (encoded as a sequence of bytes) in inverted order

Returns a double equal to: inputFloat * (0.01 * inputInteger)

Parameters must be passed as "inputFloat,inputInteger" in the text field below.

Example: 3.0,1

IdSyncResult methodWithNestedType(IdSyncResult)
